metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43785 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in libX11 due to a boundary condition within the _XkbReadKeySyms() function. This flaw allows a local user to trigger an out-of-bounds read error and read the contents of memory on the system.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-43785` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx11-6 - 2:1.7.5-1ubuntu0.3
libx11-data - 2:1.7.5-1ubuntu0.3
libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.7.5-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libx11 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.7.5-1ubuntu0.3').
